title: Troubling Developments In the Pipeline Bombing (Ep 1862)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest disturbing developments in the bombing of the nordstream pipeline, and how this story could lead to an escalating world war. 
I also address the worst Biden video to emerge yet, and the consequences for us globally. 

News Picks:


Who could be behind the Nord Stream pipeline sabotage?


Americans should flee Russia immediately, could be conscripted, US Embassy urges.


Florida Sheriff says there may be hundreds of fatalities in the hurricane zone. 

The White House struggles to explain why Biden was calling on a dead congresswoman. 

Big Brother watching? Government agencies buying cell phone, internet data to track Americans.



More FBI whistleblowers are coming forward.


Interest rate hikes may bite Biden.


Mortgages are being canceled as interest rates jump.
